home.title: Hi, I'm Henri SEDJAME
home.subtitle: A passionate fullstack developer
home.description: Self-taught developer, I design and implement applications using multiple technologies across the entire application stack. My work focuses on building functional user interfaces, implementing robust business logic, and developing reliable APIs. I also develop open-source libraries to contribute, in my own way, to the software development ecosystem. With attention to code structure, performance, and maintainability, I aim to deliver clear, scalable solutions suited to real-world use cases.
